title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 4(4) of the Road Traffic Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2016 (Section
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 2016 (Section 

4) (Manner of Notification) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited road traffic act 2016 (section 4) (manner notification) regulation 2024

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 4(4) of the Road Traffic Act
heading: 2. A notification under section 4(2) of the Road Traffic Act 2016 (No. 21
text_raw:
2. A notification under section 4(2) of the Road Traffic Act 2016 (No. 21 
of 2016) shall be made electronically by means of an online system provided by 
or on behalf of the Minister for Transport for the purpose of making such 
notifications. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 21 November 2024 

JAMES LAWLESS, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [652] 3
